column1:
Returning from Europe last night thru #MIA 
EMT: Been in contact w/ anyone infected by #coronavirus ?
Me: Just through 3 of the largest hubs on that continent in the past 48 hours, on 3 planes, and a bus. And now I'm in contact with you. So...
EMT: Ok, welcome in
#coronapocolypse
